skins.shipDescription: Deutschland-class armored cruiser number three C Admiral Graf Spee.
skins.selfIntroduction: Admiral Graf Spee, Deutschland-class armored cruiser number 3 of the Iron Blood Navy. I was attacked by Royal Navy cruisers and then took refuge in Montevideo, but in the end I scuttled myself... Commander, this time I'm going to fight! To the very end!
skins.acquisition: No matter where I go, the war never ends... Deutschland-class armored ship number 3, Admiral Graf Spee, reporting for duty.
skins.login: I will fight for you till the very end.
skins.details: No matter how poor the odds are, I will always head for the battlefield. ...That way people will admire me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Wars don't exist for mindless slaughter, they exist for victory.
skins.secretaryIdle2: One's first battle being their last... That sort of thing isn't all that unusual for us Iron Blood ships.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Give talking to people... a try? I've always been alone, so what am I supposed to talk about...
skins.secretaryTouch: It's sunny today? Yeah... just like it was back on the Río de la Plata.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, may I hug you, even though my hands are like this?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Commander, could you not ruffle up my hair like that...?

skins.shipDescription: I sailed alone, fought alone, and then I was sunk while being alone. Now I found a new beginning... Hmm? Commander, you've been staring and laughing at me since the beginning… do you want to eat this?
skins.acquisition: I sailed alone, fought alone, and then I was sunk while being alone. Now I found a new beginning... Hmm? Commander, you've been staring and laughing at me since the beginning… do you want to eat this?
skins.login: Eugen taught me how to use makeup, but... does it actually make me look pretty...?
skins.details: I'm trying hard to learn about everyday things. Living a normal life is not so simple, compared to fighting...
skins.secretaryIdle1: My pantyhose? Ajax gave me them as an enrollment gift... I examined them very thoroughly and didn't find anything weird, but I doubt they're just a normal pair of stockings...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Viersechs doesn't like picture books? I see... Everyone else in the Z-class seems to like them, though...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hipper? Want some snacks? I get it. "Not really" means "yes" in your dictionary. Okay, say "aah."
skins.secretaryTouch: Deutschland? Could you stop using your megaphone to shout "people who harass the girl with my phone will be expelled"... It's embarrassing, and more importantly, it's really distracting...

skins.shipDescription: I never dreamt that I'd be able to don this outfit and live a normal, peaceful life... Thank you, Commander...
skins.acquisition: I never dreamt that I'd be able to don this outfit and live a normal, peaceful life... Thank you, Commander...
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander! Um... I heard from Ajax that you have a very "special" hobby... but what kind of hobby is it?
skins.details: I'm so glad that I can finally practice cooking! I want to give something back to all the kindhearted people here!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ajax... You're not pulling my leg this time, are you?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hipper is a totally different person on the internet compared to how she is in real life. Maybe she just has trouble expressing herself around people she cares about...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Miss Illustrious, could you teach me how to make tea? Admiral Hipper invited me to a tea party between the Royal Navy and Iron Blood, but I've never brewed tea before...
skins.secretaryTouch: Thanks to Juustagram, even people like me who aren't very sociable can still chat with everyone... Oh look, Graf Zeppelin just made a new post!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, I want to give you a hug too~

skins.shipDescription: It's so fancy, so formal... Is this a "party"? I'm not sure I'll be able to fit in... But if you'll go with me, Commander, I'll give it a try!
skins.acquisition: It's so fancy, so formal... Is this a "party"? I'm not sure I'll be able to fit in... But if you'll go with me, Commander, I'll give it a try!
skins.login: So this is where you were. There are so many people in the hall, and I was worried about what I'd do if I'd lost you...
skins.details: A ballroom dance...? Sorry, but I don't really know how to... I just need to follow your steps? O-okay, then I could... give it a try.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ajax... She's not planning something weird for the party, is she?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Everyone here is having so much fun... I could never even imagine my past self being at a place like this.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, my friends are calling for me. Could you excuse me for a bit?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, am I in time with your steps?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, people are staring at us.

skins.shipDescription: My sister just wouldn't stop bugging me, so I finally caved and agreed to do this... Anyways, all I have to do is get up on stage and sing, right?
skins.acquisition: My sister just wouldn't stop bugging me, so I finally caved and agreed to do this... Anyways, all I have to do is get up on stage and sing, right?
skins.login: Commander, do you mind if I practice here?
skins.details: My sister's always pushing this "for the glory of Iron Blood" stuff onto me. Can't she do this idol stuff herself...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Um... Maybe it's because I'm so used to working with everyone, but I feel like it's actually pretty easy being onstage.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, do you think you can stop my sister from getting everyone to hold up those "World's?Cutest" signs when I go on? It's really embarrassing...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Idols are there to make people smile... I never thought I could do something like that.
skins.secretaryTouch: These hands are no longer weapons of war, but for returning the admiration of my fans. Right, I can do this...!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, have you forgotten what my hands can do?
